heading_id.title: Heading ID
heading_id.description:
Unique identifier for the pagination heading element. Used for ARIA labeling
and associating the navigation landmark with its semantic description.
Also used as base ID for live region announcements.

current.title: Current Page
current.description:
Current active page number (1-based index). Used to highlight the current
page with aria-current="page" for screen reader accessibility.

items.title: Pagination Items
items.description:
Complete pagination data structure including page links, navigation buttons,
and ellipsis indicators. Supports Drupal's standard pager array format.

previous.title: Previous Page Link
previous.description: Previous page navigation link data (omit if on first page)

title.title: Previous Page Title
title.description: Descriptive title for previous page link

aria_label.title: Previous Page ARIA Label
aria_label.description: Enhanced ARIA label for screen readers

next.title: Next Page Link
next.description: Next page navigation link data (omit if on last page)

title.title: Next Page Title
title.description: Descriptive title for next page link

aria_label.title: Next Page ARIA Label
aria_label.description: Enhanced ARIA label for screen readers

pages.title: Page Number Links
pages.description:
Object with page numbers as keys and page data as values.
Each page entry should contain href for navigation.

title.title: Page Link Title
title.description: Optional title attribute for the page link

aria_label.title: Page Link ARIA Label
aria_label.description: Enhanced ARIA label for page links

is_current.title: Is Current Page
is_current.description: Whether this page is the current active page

ellipses.title: Ellipsis Indicators
ellipses.description:
Object indicating where ellipsis (...) should be displayed between
page numbers. Keys are page numbers after which ellipsis should appear.

show.title: Show Ellipsis
show.description: Whether to show ellipsis after this page number

aria_label.title: Ellipsis ARIA Label
aria_label.description: ARIA label for ellipsis indicators

parameters.title: URL Parameters
parameters.description:
Additional URL parameters to preserve across pagination (e.g., search queries,
filters). These will be maintained in all pagination links.

pagination_metadata.title: Pagination Metadata
pagination_metadata.description:
Comprehensive pagination metadata for advanced navigation, performance optimization,
and Swiss municipal portal integration. Contains all necessary data for
accessibility compliance and citizen service optimization.

total_items.title: Total Items
total_items.description:
Total number of items across all pages. Used for result count announcements
and pagination context. Critical for Swiss accessibility compliance.

items_per_page.title: Items Per Page
items_per_page.description:
Number of items displayed per page. Used for navigation calculations
and performance optimization in municipal portals.

total_pages.title: Total Pages
total_pages.description:
Total number of pages in the result set. Used for pagination bounds
and navigation context announcements.

start_item.title: Start Item Number
start_item.description:
The index of the first item on the current page (1-based).
Used for "Showing X-Y of Z" announcements.

end_item.title: End Item Number
end_item.description:
The index of the last item on the current page (1-based).
Used for "Showing X-Y of Z" announcements.

page_range.title: Page Range Configuration
page_range.description:
Configuration for visible page number range and ellipsis behavior.
Optimized for Swiss municipal portal navigation patterns.

adjacency.title: Adjacent Pages
adjacency.description: Number of pages to show on each side of current page

max_pages_shown.title: Maximum Pages Shown
max_pages_shown.description: Maximum number of page links to display at once

show_first_last.title: Show First/Last Links
show_first_last.description: Whether to always show first and last page links

ellipsis_handling.title: Ellipsis Handling
ellipsis_handling.description: Strategy for displaying ellipsis between page ranges

performance_settings.title: Performance Settings
performance_settings.description:
Performance optimization settings for large result sets and
municipal portal citizen access patterns.

lazy_loading.title: Enable Lazy Loading
lazy_loading.description: Enable AJAX-based lazy loading for better performance

batch_size.title: Batch Size
batch_size.description: Number of items to load per AJAX request

preload_adjacent.title: Preload Adjacent Pages
preload_adjacent.description: Preload next/previous pages for faster navigation

accessibility_config.title: Accessibility Configuration
accessibility_config.description:
Swiss eCH-0059 Version 3 accessibility configuration with municipal
compliance settings and multilingual support.

pagination_label.title: Pagination ARIA Label
pagination_label.description:
Custom ARIA label for the pagination navigation landmark.
Defaults to multilingual municipal standards.

verbose_labels.title: Enable Verbose Labels
verbose_labels.description:
Enable detailed ARIA labels with context information for
enhanced screen reader accessibility.

live_region_settings.title: Live Region Configuration
live_region_settings.description: Configuration for ARIA live regions and announcements

enable_announcements.title: Enable Live Announcements
enable_announcements.description: Enable ARIA live region announcements for navigation

multilingual_labels.title: Multilingual Label Support
multilingual_labels.description:
Swiss federal language requirement support for German, French,
Italian, and English accessibility labels.

fallback_language.title: Fallback Language
fallback_language.description: Fallback language when primary is unavailable

municipal_theme_support.title: Municipal Theme Support
municipal_theme_support.description:
Configuration for Swiss municipal theme variations and
canton-specific accessibility requirements.

canton.title: Canton Code
canton.description: Swiss canton code for specific accessibility requirements

municipality.title: Municipality Name
municipality.description: Municipality name for branding and compliance

navigation_context.title: Navigation Context Configuration
navigation_context.description:
Advanced navigation context settings for enhanced user experience
and Swiss municipal portal integration.

enabled.title: Enable Skip Navigation
enabled.description: Enable skip navigation links for accessibility

target_selector.title: Skip Target Selector
target_selector.description: CSS selector for skip navigation target

focus_management.title: Focus Management
focus_management.description: Advanced focus management for navigation interactions

restore_focus.title: Restore Focus After Navigation
restore_focus.description: Restore focus to pagination after content updates

focus_target.title: Focus Target Strategy
focus_target.description: Where to place focus after navigation

focus_delay.title: Focus Delay (ms)
focus_delay.description: Delay before setting focus after navigation

display_options.title: Display Options
display_options.description:
Visual display configuration for Swiss municipal portal requirements
and responsive design optimization.

responsive_behavior.title: Responsive Behavior
responsive_behavior.description: How pagination adapts to different screen sizes

show_result_count.title: Show Result Count
show_result_count.description: Display "Showing X-Y of Z results" information

show_page_size_selector.title: Show Page Size Selector
show_page_size_selector.description: Display items per page selection dropdown

parentSchema.title: Items Per Page
parentSchema.description:
Number of items displayed per page. Used for navigation calculations
and performance optimization in municipal portals.

parentSchema.title: Total Pages
parentSchema.description:
Total number of pages in the result set. Used for pagination bounds
and navigation context announcements.

errors.message: must NOT have fewer than 3 characters

parentSchema.title: Heading ID
parentSchema.description:
Unique identifier for the pagination heading element. Used for ARIA labeling
and associating the navigation landmark with its semantic description.
Also used as base ID for live region announcements.

parentSchema.title: Current Page
parentSchema.description:
Current active page number (1-based index). Used to highlight the current
page with aria-current="page" for screen reader accessibility.

errors.message: must NOT have fewer than 1 characters

parentSchema.title: Total Items
parentSchema.description:
Total number of items across all pages. Used for result count announcements
and pagination context. Critical for Swiss accessibility compliance.

parentSchema.title: Items Per Page
parentSchema.description:
Number of items displayed per page. Used for navigation calculations
and performance optimization in municipal portals.

parentSchema.title: Total Pages
parentSchema.description:
Total number of pages in the result set. Used for pagination bounds
and navigation context announcements.

errors.message: must be equal to one of the allowed values

parentSchema.title: Canton Code
parentSchema.description: Swiss canton code for specific accessibility requirements
